title: Great News For Tyrian Lovers
content:
I know that pretty much every time I post a topic, it is about Tyrian. Sorry, I just can't help myself when it is such a sweet game. Anyways... I think I've posted about the game boy color and game boy advance versions that were recently released on the PC. That's all in good fun, but chek out [url=http://members.iinet.net.au/~vannevar/tyrian/]members.iinet.net.au/~vannevar/tyrian/[/url]
HOrray! You will see that Tyrian 2 is finalyl in development! I don't know how One Must Fall 2 ever was, or if it ever made it out, but this will be way cooler.

And to add somethin unTyrian, here is another fun link for classic game lovers:
[url=http://193.151.73.87/games/lemmings/]193.151.73.87/games/lemmings/[/url]*** --- I Am Keen is hell bent for leather. Are you? --- ***
